body.p: Welcome to the Eucalyptus Hybid Cloud Guide.

section.title: What is a Hybrid Cloud?
section.p: Hybrid cloud means one of four things:

ul.li: You have a workload that can be moved from one cloud to another (e.g., AppDynamics)
Do-it-yourself hybrid IT: manually moving VMs from VMware to AWS
Hybrid application that uses two clouds and is aware that it is running in two clouds (e.g., EventLive)
